[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

POS BILL TO ROOM DETAIL

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{% set data = frappe.db.sql(" select ft.name, ft.posting_date, ft.reservation, ft.reservation_stay, ft.room_type_alias, ft.room_number, ft.guest, ft.guest_name, ft.total_tax, ft.total_amount, ft.business_source, ft.note, s.name, sp.product_name, sp.quantity, sp.price, sp.discount_amount, sp.amount from `tabFolio Transaction` ft inner join `tabSale` s on s.name = ft.sale inner join `tabSale Product` sp on s.name = sp.parent where ft.property = '{0}' and ft.posting_date between '{1}' and '{2}' ".format(doc.name, frappe.form_dict.get('start_date'), frappe.form_dict.get('end_date') ),as_dict=1)%}"}]
name: POS Bill to Room Detail
